original_text: Later, when he was no longer drunk with the wine, Noah woke up. He found out what his youngest son, Ham, had done.
korean_text: 노아가 술이 깨어 그의 작은 아들이 자기에게 행한 일을 알고

sentences.original_text: Later, when he was no longer drunk with the wine
sentences.korean_translation: 나중에, 그가 더 이상 포도주에 취하지 않았을 때

sentences.original_text: He found out what his youngest son, Ham, had done
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 자신의 막내 아들 함이 한 일을 알아냈습니다
